name: SUMIGPS
description: Migration by Phase Shift with turning rays

parameter_descriptions.dx: Distance between successive cdp's (from header(d2) or 1.0)
parameter_descriptions.ffil: Trapezoidal window of frequencies to migrate
parameter_descriptions.tmig: Times corresponding to interval velocities in vmig
parameter_descriptions.vmig: Interval velocities corresponding to times in tmig
parameter_descriptions.nxpad: Number of cdps to pad with zeros before FFT
parameter_descriptions.ltaper: Length of linear taper for left and right edges
parameter_descriptions.tmpdir: Directory path prefix for storing temporary files
